name: DEPRECATED - Flickr - (GM) - Commented ON - Small
description:
Check out the original style at userstyles.org
DEPRECATED - IMPORTANT (2020): It should be better to use now (more updated) ▶ My Flickr ALLinONE styles: - Flickr Widescreen - ALLinONE (Part 1): the first and principal to install - Flickr Widescreen - ALLinONE (Part 2): Adaptation for GM (Adaptation for some great Userscripts i use a lot , since a long time...), and Additional styles for some some unused pages. - - Flickr WideScreen - Dark & Grey ▶ Its for the Greasemonkey Script (GM), without others scripts which add other information near each thumb in thumbnail: by Alesa Dam: " Flickr Commented On (USO Mirror) "

user.name: decembre
user.about: I build Userstyles principally for : - Firefox. - WideScreen (1920x1080) adaptation (More things in the window, less scrolling) - Dark Gray style (better for night surfing) - Site Navigation (Tweaks its Interface by moving many things) - ByPass Sites Limitations Some example: - Flickr' Userstyles by decembre - Userstyles : Userstyles TableView+Enhancer - Dark-Grey - Mozilla : Mozilla Addon Widescreen - Yahoo : Yahoo New Mail - Simply Dark And Gray - YouTube: Youtube WideScreen (New Design Polymer) - Streaming : Stream - DuckDuckGo - Streaming Helper - Télévision: Télérama WideScreen - New design - Search: DuckDuckGo - Multi-Columns GooGle - Multi-Columns Dark and Gray Note: Due to Userstyles.org limitation, some of my userstyles are minified (to reduce their size) by this online tool: CSS Minifier But now they are unreadable easily, sorry. You can watch their readable userstyle on Usertyles.World [USw] (or better use it!), because USw have not limit size when you post Many of my Userstyle are published on Userstyles.World [USw] too : Decembre [Userstyles.World [USw] It's a new site with a great accessibility and no limitation in size for the userstyle posted. I use some useful things like... Addon / extensions: Userscripts : Decembre - My Favoris [GreasyFork] Just for info (deprecated): ★ MY ★ Installed ★ GM ★ Surf (USO Mirror) FireFox Addons : Decembre Favorite Add-ons I try to adapt/create some Greasemonkey script: in GreasyFork. By example: - USERSTYLES - TABLES Sorter SIMPLE - Flickr - AUTO More Mini Thumbnail in Photo page Some my userstyles are published here too, by example: - Flickr WideScreen - BigONE I publish my tweaks here: Decembre's Pastebin I spend a lot of time on Userstyles but too: - Flickr and my pools in it: > Portrait★Faces > Portrait★Faces★Open Minded

obsoletion_message:
IMPORTANT (2020):
It should be better to use now (more updated)
▶ My Flickr ALLinONE userstyles:
additional_info: ▷ by Alesa Dam: " Flickr Commented On (USO Mirror) " (GM :Greasemonkey Script): "Shows whether or not you have commented on a photo. Adds a small icon to the menu bar on a flickr photo. The icon will be greyed out if you haven't posted a comment on the particular image - and will be coloured if you have! There is also a retrieving image, so you know when the thing is working." ▷ Discussion (Flickr Hacks) : Request: A fast way to know if I've already commented a particular picture (just like the favorite star but for comments) ► ► NEW How to fix this script, by carrmp == As of April 22 2015 [after Flickr's radical change] : BROKEN at this time... : "The following change to the script fixed this problem for me. Change the following on line 247 of function getUsername() from //a[ to //span[ The line should read : var buddyIcon = document.evaluate('.//span[contains(@class,"account")]/img[contains(@class,"gn-buddyicon")]', document, null, XPathResult.FIRST_ORDERED_NODE_TYPE, null).singleNodeValue; " ►► Firefox Addons and Greasemonkey Scripts (GM) for Flickr. Read here which Flickr Greasemonkey Script (GM) you can use : "My BIG List Of Scripts", in "Flickr Hacks". ▷ Thumbnail Preview With: These Styles are better with this Useful Addon/Script to preview thumbnail on hover: ▶ Thumbnail Zoom Plus
